mapper.insert: insert into logistics_customer (cuID, customerName, customerPsd, customerSex, Brithday, Tel, Address, Comment) values (#{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerpsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customersex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update logistics_customer set customerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerPsd = #{customerpsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerSex = #{customersex,jdbcType=CHAR}, Brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cuID = #{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cuID, customerName, customerPsd, customerSex, Brithday, Tel, Address, Comment from logistics_customer
